publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1362 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Substitutes-That the Parliament agrees that Tricia Marwick be appointed to replace Brian Adam as the Scottish National Party substitute on the Education Committee. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-1362 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Substitutes-That the Parliament agrees that Tricia Marwick be appointed to replace Brian Adam as the Scottish National Party substitute on the Education Committee. Supported by: Tavish Scott
